title: Rahu in 6th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 6th house for Virgo Ascendant, competition, work pressure, health routines, and conflict management intensify. There is a strong drive to win over rivals, overcome obstacles, and prove competence through unconventional methods. You may thrive in competitive environments, litigation, or crisis-driven roles. However, stress, irregular habits, and obsession with control can affect health. This phase rewards discipline, strategic planning, and ethical conduct, while shortcuts or manipulative tactics can create hidden problems later.

sections.heading: Finance & Growth
points: Income through service or problem-solving roles

closing: Rahu in the 6th house empowers Virgo Ascendant to conquer challenges through strategy, provided discipline replaces obsession.
